name: Element of Justice
description:
A lisa driven horror story endorsed by 4chan and delivered directly to you.

Play as a pony on her journey to survive and find clues about what lies ahead. Featuring exciting gameplay, including a special twist at the end.

*This game contains imagery not suitable for children or those seeking to be  aesthetically pleased.

This game is deeper than The Mystery of the Epstein Island (c) Anonymous from 4chan
